scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply takeoff --remote
scripts.db:local-migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply takeoff --local
scripts.db:shell: wrangler d1 execute takeoff --remote --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table';"
scripts.db:local-shell: wrangler d1 execute takeoff --local --command="SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table';"
